p: The inhibitory action of the essential oil of T. minuta flower and vitamin C against lipid peroxyl radical at various concentrations is shown in Fig. 4. The essential oil of T. minuta flower percentage inhibition of lipid peroxidation at 0.5Â mg/mL was 67% while vitamin C was 54% indicating lower inhibitory scavenging effect compared to the results obtained in DPPH and ABTS tests at same concentration.
